title: Adjective collection 3
sentences: El camino al parque es muy
The path to the park is very long and I am tired.
I wear shorts because it is very hot.
This sweater is very wide/loose for me; I need a small one.
que el coche no puede pasar.
The street is so narrow that the car cannot pass.
This suitcase is very heavy and I cannot carry it alone.
para ir a caminar a la montaña.
I use a light backpack to go walking in the mountains.
My computer is very modern and works perfectly.
en el centro de la ciudad.
We live in an old building in the city center.
Today the sun is very bright and the sky is blue.
The room is very dark; can you turn on the light?
The bread is hard because it's from yesterday.
El colchón de mi cama es muy
My bed mattress is very soft and comfortable.
That man is very rich and has many businesses.
pero la gente es muy amable.
It is a poor neighborhood but the people are very kind.
This watch is too expensive for my budget.
I bought these apples very cheap at the market.
para no perderse en el bosque.
This map is very useful to not get lost in the forest.
Ese paraguas está roto y es
That umbrella is broken and it is useless right now.
The glass is full of fresh orange juice.
The water bottle is empty; I have to buy more.
My mobile is broken and I cannot make calls.
The car is already fixed and it works well.
Your white shirt is very clean and ironed.
Your shoes are very dirty from the mud on the path.
Me gusta mucho el olor de un libro
I really like the smell of a new book.
